column2: How very odd. All three panels are activated. But the box is still closed. Not liking the looks of this.
That's what I like to hear! Okay, so open the clubhouse first.
Click on the button at the right to open the clubhouse.
We're in luck! Riley was trying to tell us the final password to open the box.
Something is garbling her speech. I know this is strange, but I think I heard Riley say MEOW!
That's funny, that's what I could make out from what she said too! MEOW!

MEOW! That's also what I heard, but I was like, why is Riley meowing? This might mean something.

We all heard the same thing thing: MEOW. MEOW. And again, MEOW.

MEOWMEOWMEOW. I must say, this password gives me pause. 

Well, let's not just stand around like cats! Let's see if this sequence opens the box! M-E-O-W–– 

Well, I'll be a –– the opening protocol has started! Riley, this ordeal is almost over!

Three key fobs. The triple password – we should be good to go – Wait – What's all this? 

*TRANSCODING*? Okay. Transcoding. Not thrilled. Not thrilled at all. Could be a while still.

Riley, hold on just a bit longer in there. I know you can! We're all here for you and we'll have you out soon!
Hope you'll check back soon! Just one more step.
